# Gluttony (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |

| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** For a total time per day of 1 round per cleric level you possess, you can increase your size as if you were affected by the *[[Enlarge Person (Spell)|enlarge person]]* spell. Activating the power or ending it is a free action.

**Gluttony Domain Spells**

**1 [[Goodberry (Spell)|Goodberry]]:** 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hit points/24 hours)

**2 [[Death Knell (Spell)|Death Knell]]:** Kills dying creature; you gain 1d8 temporary hp, +2 to Str, and +1 caster level.

**3 [[Create Food and Water (Spell)|Create Food and Water]]:** Feeds three humans (or one horse)/level.

**4 [[Vampiric Touch (Spell)|Vampiric Touch]]:** Touch deals 1d6/2 levels damage; caster gains damage as hp.

**5 [[Baleful Polymorph (Spell)|Baleful Polymorph]]:** Transforms subject into harmless animal.

**6 [[Heroes' Feast (Spell)|Heroesâ€™ Feast]]:** Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

**7 [[Stone to Flesh (Spell)|Stone to Flesh]]:** Restores [[Petrified|petrified]] creatures.

**8 [[Bite of the King (Spell)|Bite of the King]]:** Swallow enemies whole.

**9 [[Trap the Soul (Spell)|Trap the Soul]] <sup>MF</sup>:** Imprisons subject within gem.
